resources.string: Minecraft is a sandbox video game created by Swedish game developer Markus Persson, better know as Notch, who later went on to found Mojang, which has been the developer and publisher of Minecraft. The creative and building aspects of Minecraft allow players to build with a variety of different cubes in a 3D procedurally generated world. Other activities in the game include exploration, resource gathering, crafting, and combat.
